comments:
The scenario in which I got the exception below was essentially the following:
Import an Apache access log and an Apache error log which correlate and create 
a correlation.  Delete the error log and close the workbench, choose to save 
the resources when prompted. Reopen the workbench and try to open the 
correlation object with the log interactions view.
